item.title: 欧洲最大养老基金购买价值 28 亿美元的抵押贷款
item.description: 欧洲最大的养老基金 Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP 收购了 27 亿欧元（28 亿美元）的荷兰抵押贷款投资组合，以扩大对该资产类别的投资。【原文：Europe’s largest pension fund, Stichting Pensioenfonds ABP, acquired a €2.7 billion ($2.8 billion) portfolio of Dutch mortgages as it expands its investment in the asset class.】

item.title: 戴比尔斯大幅降价放弃钻石战略
item.description: 全球最大的钻石生产商戴比尔斯公司已将钻石价格全面下调 10%以上，放弃了为不景气的市场筑底的努力。【原文：De Beers has cut diamond prices by more than 10% across the board as the world’s biggest producer abandons attempts to put a floor under the slumping market.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀放缓，降息预期升温
item.description: 土耳其消费物价增长速度放缓，增强了人们对土耳其央行最早可能在本月开始降息的预期。【原文：Turkey’s consumer prices are increasing at a slower pace, boosting expectations that the central bank might begin cutting interest rates as early as this month.】

item.title: 美国收紧对中国获取人工智能内存和芯片工具的限制
item.description: 拜登政府公布了对中国获得芯片和人工智能重要部件的新限制，使遏制中国技术野心的行动升级。【原文：The Biden administration unveiled new restrictions on China’s access to vital components for chips and AI, escalating a campaign to contain Beijing’s technological ambitions.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务任命首席重组官管理债务
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司任命 AlixPartners 的 Julian Gething 监督其债务重组，因为这家陷入困境的公用事业公司正努力避免暂时国有化。【原文：Thames Water appointed Julian Gething from AlixPartners to oversee its debt restructuring, as the troubled utility seeks to avoid temporary nationalization.】

item.title: 香港宽频确认已收到 I Squared 的收购意向
item.description: 香港宽带网络有限公司已收到来自 I Squared Capital 的不具约束力的初步意向书，有可能引发对这家香港上市宽带供应商的竞购战。【原文：HKBN Ltd. has received a non-binding preliminary indication of interest from I Squared Capital, potentially setting up a bidding war for the Hong Kong-listed broadband provider.】

item.title: 中央银行大肆挥霍后，哈萨克斯坦坚戈创历史新低
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦中央银行在过去两周内花费了超过 10 亿美元进行干预，该国货币周一跌至历史新低。【原文：Kazakhstan’s currency tumbled to a record low on Monday after the central bank spent more than $1 billion on interventions over the past two weeks.】

item.title: 据说沙特家禽巨头阿尔瓦塔尼亚正在探讨出售公司事宜
item.description: 中东最大的家禽生产商 Alwatania 正在探索出售公司，熟悉内情的人士说，因为沙特阿拉伯正在推动粮食自给自足，这使得家禽业更具吸引力。【原文：Alwatania, the largest poultry producer in the Middle East, is exploring a sale of the company, people familiar with the matter said, as Saudi Arabia’s push for food self-sufficiency makes the industry more attractive.】

item.title: 伊朗与中国的石油贸易因美国制裁油轮而受到冲击
item.description: 美国扩大对运输伊朗原油的油轮的制裁，阻碍了贸易中的一个关键环节，减缓了石油输出国组织（OPEC）产油国向其最重要客户输送石油的速度：中国。【原文：A broadening of US sanctions on tankers that haul Iranian crude has jammed a crucial cog of the trade, slowing the delivery of oil from the OPEC producer to its most valuable customer: China.】

item.title: 德国大众工人因削减成本计划举行罢工
item.description: 在劳资双方未能就如何削减大众汽车公司同名品牌的成本达成协议后，德国各地的大众汽车公司工人于周一发起了罢工。【原文：Volkswagen AG workers across Germany initiated walkouts on Monday after labor leaders and management failed to reach an agreement over how to cut costs at the carmaker’s namesake brand.】

item.title: 南非工厂因特朗普忧虑导致需求疲软而情绪低落
item.description: 由于国内需求疲软拖累南非制造业，加上唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在上个月的美国大选中获胜，全球政治前景变得暗淡，南非制造商的情绪在 11 月份又回到了萎缩状态。【原文：Sentiment among South African manufacturers snapped back to contractionary territory in November as weak domestic demand weighed on the industry and Donald Trump’s victory in last month’s US election muddied the global political outlook.】

item.title: 特朗普将美元武器化被视为不必要的金砖挑衅
item.description: 市场观察人士说，唐纳德-特朗普向世界各国施压，要求它们继续坚守以美元为基础的金融体系，这种策略有可能适得其反。【原文：Donald Trump’s pressure on countries around the world to stay anchored to a US-dollar-based financial system is a tactic that risks backfiring, market watchers say.】

item.title: 欧洲能源系统下周面临寒冷天气考验
item.description: 下周，欧洲西北部的气温将低于季节性标准，这是对电力系统的一次考验，因为欧洲大陆将比往常更快地动用天然气储存。【原文：Temperatures in northwest Europe are set to slip below seasonal norms next week, a test for power systems as the continent taps gas storage faster than usual.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦通胀降温，为降息提供空间
item.description: 巴基斯坦上个月的通货膨胀有所缓解，为中央银行进一步放宽利率提供了空间。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation eased last month, providing space to the central bank to ease interest rates further.】

item.title: Stellantis 因首席执行官提前离职而陷入困境
item.description: Stellantis NV 首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）的意外离职，使这家吉普越野车和标致汽车制造商在行业发生重大动荡之际失去了明确的领导层。【原文：Stellantis NV Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares’s surprise departure leaves the maker of Jeep SUVs and Peugeot cars without clear leadership at a time of significant upheaval in the industry.】

item.title: 勒庞再次向巴尼耶施压，法国债券下跌
item.description: 在极右翼政党再次威胁称，如果不满足其对 2025 年预算的要求，就将推翻米歇尔-巴尼耶总理的政府之后，法国债券下跌。【原文：French bonds fell after the far-right party renewed its threats to bring down Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s government if its demands over the 2025 budget aren’t met.】

item.title: 奥地利公用事业公司停止付款后，俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司面临更多索赔
item.description: 奥地利一家公用事业公司决定停止支付俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的供应费用，这可能会为其他国家开创一个先例，因为欧洲希望减少对俄罗斯天然气巨头的依赖。【原文：The decision by an Austrian utility to stop paying for supplies from Gazprom PJSC may set a precedent for others to follow as Europe looks to cut its dependence on the Russian gas giant.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格上涨，寒冷天气预报加剧担忧
item.description: 由于天气预报显示欧洲部分地区天气转冷，欧洲天然气价格连续第二个交易日上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices headed for a second session of gains as weather forecasts turned colder for parts of the continent.】

item.title: 波兰拘留 Pegasus 间谍软件案中央银行董事会成员
item.description: 周一，波兰中央银行管理委员会的一名成员被警方拘留，目的是让他配合议会调查前政府时期使用 Pegasus 间谍软件的情况。【原文：A member of Poland’s central bank’s management board was detained by police on Monday to make him cooperate with a parliamentary investigation into the use of Pegasus spyware under the previous government.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，与瑞波挂钩的 XRP 飙升至第三大代币
item.description: 与瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc.【原文：XRP, a token linked to Ripple Labs Inc., has vaulted rivals to become the third-largest cryptocurrency in a $100 billion rally.】

item.title: Nationwide 称英国房价创 2022 年 3 月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，由于强劲的就业市场和工资增长继续支撑着购房者的兴趣，英国房价的涨幅创下了自 2022 年 3 月以来的最大值。【原文：UK house prices rose by the most since March 2022, according to one of the country’s largest mortgage lenders, as a strong jobs market and wage gains continued to support buyers’ interest.】

item.title: 特朗普回国前韩国预算之争考验尹炳世
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈面临着对其领导能力的又一次考验，因为主要反对党正在争夺年度预算的控制权，在韩国为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的回归做准备之际，这一结果将使人们进一步怀疑他制定政策的能力。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol faces another test of his leadership as the main opposition party vies to control the annual budget, an outcome that would cast further doubt on his ability to enact policy as the nation braces for Donald Trump’s return.】

item.title: 英国呼吁交易员停止盘前数据发布
item.description: 预计英国将在新年伊始决定是否继续在金融市场开盘前发布关键经济数据，投资者称这种做法会刺激经济波动，并传导至实体经济。【原文：The UK is expected to decide early in the new year whether it will continue to release key economic data before financial markets open, a practice that investors say spurs volatility that also feeds through to the real economy.】

item.title: 对菲律宾副总统杜特尔特提起弹劾案
item.description: 根据政党名单 Akbayan 的声明，周一在众议院对菲律宾副总统萨拉-杜特尔特（Sara Duterte）提出了弹劾申诉。【原文：An impeachment complaint was filed against Philippines Vice President Sara Duterte at the House of Representatives on Monday, according to a statement from the party list Akbayan.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司赫尔辛正在为欧洲制造攻击型无人机
item.description: 赫尔辛公司通过为无人机和喷气式战斗机开发人工智能软件，成为欧洲最有价值的初创企业之一。现在，它正在制造自己的武器。【原文：Helsing became one of Europe’s most valuable startups by building artificial intelligence software for drones and jet fighters. Now it’s making weapons of its own.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下滑，房价数据在前
Prosus 出售科技公司股份，上半年实现盈利
item.description: Prosus NV 上半年实现盈利，这家在全球拥有 20 多亿客户的技术投资商出售了在中国和南非的在线业务股份。【原文：Prosus NV reported a first-half profit as the technology investor with more than 2 billion customers worldwide sold stakes in online businesses in China and South Africa.】

item.title: 卡扎克称通胀问题几近解决，欧洲央行将降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲中央银行应继续削减借贷成本，因为消费者价格增长几乎受到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank should continue to cut borrowing costs as consumer-price growth is nearly in check, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】
